com.redhat.rhn.manager.download

Class DownloadManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.redhat.rhn.manager.BaseManager
      • com.redhat.rhn.manager.download.DownloadManager

  • public class DownloadManager
extends BaseManager
    Provides methods for downloading packages and files and getting urls DownloadManager

    • Method Detail

      • getPackageDownloadPath

        public static java.lang.String getPackageDownloadPath(Package pack,
                                                      User user)
        Get a download path (part of the url) that is used to download a package. The url will be in the form of /download/SHA1_TOKEN/EXPIRE_TIME/userId/packId/filename.rpm
        Parameters:
        pack - the package
        user - the user
        Returns:
        the path/url

      • getPackageDownloadPathNoExpiration

        public static java.lang.String getPackageDownloadPathNoExpiration(Package pack,
                                                                  User user)
        Get a download path (part of the url) that is used to download a package. The url will be in the form of /download/SHA1_TOKEN/0/userId/packId/filename.rpm The url will NOT expire and should generally only be used
        Parameters:
        pack - the package
        user - the user
        Returns:
        the path/url

      • getPackageSourceDownloadPath

        public static java.lang.String getPackageSourceDownloadPath(Package pkg,
                                                            PackageSource src,
                                                            User user)
        Get a download path that is used to download a srpm. The url will be in the form of /download/SHA1_TOKEN/EXPIRE_TIME/userId/packId/filename.rpm
        Parameters:
        pkg - the package
        src - the package source
        user - the user
        Returns:
        the path/url

      • getChannelSyncLogDownloadPath

        public static java.lang.String getChannelSyncLogDownloadPath(Channel c,
                                                             User user)
        Get a download path that is used to download a repo log file.
        Parameters:
        c - the Channel
        user - the user
        Returns:
        the path/url

      • getScriptRawOutputDownloadPath

        public static java.lang.String getScriptRawOutputDownloadPath(java.lang.Long actionId,
                                                              java.lang.Long scriptResultId,
                                                              User currentUser)
        Get a download path that is used to download raw script output.
        Parameters:
        actionId - action id
        scriptResultId - script result id
        currentUser - current user
        Returns:
        the path/url

      • getFileSHA1Token

        public static java.lang.String getFileSHA1Token(java.lang.Long fileId,
                                                java.lang.String filename,
                                                User user,
                                                java.lang.Long expire,
                                                java.lang.String type)
        get the Hmac SHA1 token use in constructing a package download url also useful if verifying a package download url
        Parameters:
        fileId - the file id
        filename - the filename of the file
        user - the user requesting the file
        expire - the expire time
        type - the type of the download (i.e. package, iso, etc..)
        Returns:
        a string representing the hash

      • isFileAvailable

        public static boolean isFileAvailable(java.lang.String path)
        Checks to see if a file exists
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the file
        Returns:
        true if available, false otherwise

      • getCrashFileDownloadPath

        public static java.lang.String getCrashFileDownloadPath(CrashFile crashFile,
                                                        User user)
        Get a download path (part of the url) that is used to download a crash file. The url will be in the form of /download/SHA1_TOKEN/EXPIRE_TIME/userId/crashId/crashfile
        Parameters:
        crashFile - the package
        user - the user
        Returns:
        the path/url
